title: Nate Holland
description: Nate holds more X-Game gold medals for Boardercross than anyone in history.  This winter the goal is gold in Sochi and I am honored to be working on his site and supporting his efforts.

title: Jayson Hale
description: This is a website for Jayson Hale, Olympic Winter athlete and generaly rad guy. Jay recently retired from US Snowboard Team.  This is his new hub for the next phase of his career.

title: The Station
description: There is nothing quite like going to show off your work to find out it has been replaced... Here is my version.

title: Alex Diebold
description: This protoype is for Alex.  He is a member of the US Snowboard team and is working his way to the 2014 Winter Games in Sochi.

title: Ken Papaleo
description: Ken is a talented photographer; in fact one of the best if not the best in the state of Colorado.  I'm not just saying that because he's my dad either.

title: If You Build It
description: This site was a part of the grass roots movement to petition ESPN to add the downhill races again in 2014.

title: The Station
description: This is the first version of The Station Hair Studio's site

title: Check Into Rehab
description: This website is no longer in production.  It was created for a sermon series at Foothills Community Church.

title: Haitian Creations
description: This website was up, but there was a little bit of a fall out with the owner. It's a long painfully boring story.  All I really have is the prototype.  It was a pretty cool site at the time with custom image galleries.

title: Jayson Hale
description: This was a website for Jayson Hale.  It was done in flash.  Don't judge me; you did flash too back then.

title: Parallax
description: This is a really fun project I did playing with parallax effects.  I have yet to implement it for a client.  I guess I just have not found someone cool enough  yet.
